discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
A, D, E are correct - https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/sql/create-account#access-control-requirements

ADE for SQL
DE for the UI

Selected Answer: DE
D and E

ADE are correct
--Account name and edition are mandatory
--Region is optional 
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/sql/create-account#required-parameters

Selected Answer: DE
ADE are correct

create account myaccount1
 admin_name = admin
 admin_password = 'TestPassword1'
 first_name = Jane
 last_name = Smith
 email = 'myemail@myorg.org'
 edition = enterprise
 region = aws_us_west_2;

questions.question_text: When initially creating an account in Snowflake, which settings can be specified? (Choose two.)

choices.E: Select all the data in tables for all accounts in an organization.
choices.C: Delete the account data for an organization.
choices.B: Edit the account data for an organization.
choices.D: View usage information for all accounts in an organization.
choices.A: Create an account for an organization.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
AD is correct.

A and D.

A user with the ORGADMIN role can perform the following actions:

Creating an Account.
View/show all accounts in the Organization.
Viewing a List of Regions Available for an Organization.
View usage information for all accounts in the organization.
Enable database replication for an account in the organization. 

Note: Once an account is created, ORGADMIN can view the account properties but does not have access to the account data.

https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/organizations#orgadmin-role

questions.question_text: What activities can a user with the ORGADMIN role perform? (Choose two.)
What is one of the benefits of using a multi-cluster virtual warehouse?

choices.C: It will automatically increase the warehouse size as needed.
choices.B: It will reduce the cost of running the warehouse.
choices.D: It will automatically start and stop additional clusters as needed.
choices.A: It will speed up data loading.

questions.question_text: When should a multi-cluster virtual warehouse be used in Snowflake?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct.

choices.A: When queuing is delaying query execution on the warehouse
choices.D: When there are no concurrent queries running on the warehouse
choices.B: When there is significant disk spilling shown on the Query Profile
choices.C: When dynamic vertical scaling is being used in the warehouse

questions.question_text: What is used to denote a pre-computed data set derived from a SELECT query specification and stored for later use?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is correct.
